name: idle Party Leader
description:
idle Party Leader is a narrative driven incremental game and a political satire which transcends the genre and goes into unfamiliar territory (and genres). Use manual clicks to make your way up the political ladder. Steal votes, use the army to threaten people to vote you and fight battles against protesters.

Features

- Collect (or steal) votes and spend them to earn more votes.
- Ten autoclickers and over fifty upgrades to unlock.
- Write the story of an autocrat in this political satire inspired by our planet's history (and by how people never learn to not repeat past mistakes).
- Reveal, play and win mini-games while you tighten your grip on power.
- Custom soundtrack support (save your music files as Track1.ogg or Track2.ogg or Track3.ogg and place them in the game's save dir).
- Several secrets waiting to be found and deciphered.
